We are trying to call EJB in our JUnit, it runs fine normally, 
however, if we run it from the TesterRunner of swingui, the 
PortableRemoteObject.narrow() method throws a ClassCastException.

Anyone has experienced this problem?
subject: Swingui TesterRunner can not call EJB?
